about.title: About
about.summary: I’m a Fullstack developer in career transition, fully committed to building practical, real‑world applications through consistent, focused, and self‑directed learning. My current work involves designing and developing Fullstack systems using technologies like Python, Flask, PostgreSQL, Docker, and RESTful APIs. I’ve built a strong technical foundation in computer networks, web protocols, Linux, version control (Git & GitHub), and software architecture. All my progress is backed by hands‑on projects available on my GitHub. I also leverage AI tools to accelerate learning, improve code quality, and experiment with creative problem‑solving techniques. Currently focused on deepening my backend expertise and contributing to meaningful projects; I’m open to opportunities where I can grow, collaborate, and turn knowledge into impact.
about.background: Self‑taught Fullstack Developer (May 2025 – Present) based in São Paulo, Brazil. Engaged in a structured, full‑time study plan combining theory with hands‑on projects. Focus areas: Python, Flask, PostgreSQL, Docker & Kubernetes, CI/CD, testing, networking, Linux, Git, HTML5/CSS3, and Flet. Projects and code are version‑controlled and published on GitHub.

about.philosophy: Practical, learning‑by‑doing approach; pragmatic engineering with iterative improvement; leverage AI tools to accelerate learning and improve code quality.
about.personal: Former freelance tattoo artist (14+ years), bringing autonomy, adaptability, client‑focused communication, and strong problem‑solving skills to software development.
